title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 300.5 - Accessibility Symbol
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 300.5 - Accessibility Symbol

State Regulations

Wherever the universal symbol of access depicting a static
figure in a wheelchair appears or would appear on signs and on other means of
communication, a symbol depicting a dynamic character leaning forward and with
a sense of movement shall appear instead: Click to View
image

Notes

ยง
300.5

Adopted, New

York State Register November 19, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 46, eff. 11/19/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
